[Your name]: Once again, thank you for choosing our services, and we look forward to working closely with you to achieve your business goals. If you decide to take advantage of the 100% upfront payment option, please let us know, and we'll provide you with the necessary payment details. Alternatively, if you prefer to stick with the standard 50% upfront and 50% upon completion payment structure, we completely understand and will still deliver the high-quality service you expect from us.

[Your name]: If you need more time to think about this offer, that's perfectly fine as well. Our priority is to ensure you feel comfortable and confident in your decision. In the meantime, if you have any questions, concerns, or would like to discuss the project further, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to help and support you every step of the way.

[Your name]: We appreciate your business, and we're committed to helping you succeed. Whichever payment option you choose, you can rest assured that our team will be dedicated to delivering a top-notch sales funnel that meets and exceeds your expectations. Thank you, and we look forward to getting started on your project.

---

This script should provide a smooth and persuasive pitch for the 100% upfront payment offer while addressing potential client concerns and emphasizing the benefits of this option.
